mapper.sql: id, random, trophy_id, address_id, used, send_goods, create_date, exchange_date, valid_date
mapper.select: select a.username username, a.phone phone, a.address address, r.exchange_date exchangeDate, t.content content from tb_address a left join tb_redom_code r on r.address_id=a.id LEFT JOIN tb_trophy t ON r.trophy_id=t.id where phone= #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update:
update tb_redom_code
address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
used = #{used,jdbcType=INTEGER},
send_goods = #{sendGoods,jdbcType=INTEGER},
exchange_date = #{exchangeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where random = #{random,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_redom_code (id, random, trophy_id, address_id, used, send_goods, exchange_date, valid_date ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.random}, #{item.trophyId}, #{item.addressId}, #{item.used}, #{item.sendGoods}, #{item.exchangeDate}, #{item.validDate} )

use,

mapper.update:
update tb_redom_code
random = #{random,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trophy_id = #{trophyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
use = #{use,jdbcType=INTEGER},
send_goods = #{sendGoods,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
exchange_date = #{exchangeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
valid_date = #{validDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_redom_code set random = #{random,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trophy_id = #{trophyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, used = #{used,jdbcType=INTEGER}, send_goods = #{sendGoods,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, exchange_date = #{exchangeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, valid_date = #{validDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
